posts.post_title: Want to buy T206 Eddie Collins POLAR BEAR and TOLSTOI
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy a Polar Bear and Tolstoi backed Eddie Collins.  Any and all conditions working on one group as raw GD-VG and graded EX, but would just like to add any examples right now that I can find.
